conbody.p: (a) Determinations and Findings (D&F) requiring Senior Procurement Executive (SPE), SAE, or higher level approval must be coordinated with the cognizant HCA by submission through the SCO to the cognizant HCA workflow.
(b) The contracting officer must submit D&Fs requiring HCA approval to the cognizant HCA workflow after coordination by the SCO.

(c) D&Fs involving small business matters must be coordinated with local Small Business Professional and/or MAJCOM/FLDCOM/DRU Center Small Business Director, as appropriate, and, at SAF level, with SAF/SB when HCA approval or coordination is required.
